channel.title: Two Rooms and a Boom: Game X where X is the number of 2r1b games hosted here including this one [Signups 10/16]
channel.description:
Two Rooms and a Boom
**Rules:** https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K545LdLCLUM
**Special Variants because this is not played IRL:** Phases will take longer, duh There's no "leaders parlay" step To usurp go **/usurp [leader] with [candidate]** To share or reveal you gots to PM me on discord
**Discord Server:** This game will be played on Discord, because it's easier https://discord.gg/fms6xaQ <- Server Link
**Rolelist:** **[color=red]Bomber[/color]** - Be with the President **[color=red]Engineer[/color]** - Card share with the Bomber **[color=red]Angel[/color]** - You're not allowed to lie **[color=blue]Red Spy[/color]** - Your colour looks Blue but you're on the Red Team **[color=red]Paranoid[/color]** - You are only allowed to Card Share once **[color=red]Red Team[/color]**
**[color=blue]President[/color]** - Avoid the Bomber **[color=blue]Doctor[/color]** - Card share with the President **[color=blue]Angel[/color]** - See above **[color=red]Blue Spy[/color]** - Your colour looks Red but you're on the Blue Team **[color=blue]Paranoid[/color]** - See above **[color=blue]Blue Team[/color]**
**[color=grey]Intern[/color]** - Be with the President **[color=grey]Rival[/color]** - Avoid the President **[color=grey]Victim[/color]** - Be with the Bomber **[color=grey]Survivor[/color]** - Avoid the Bomber
**Signups:** 1. Memesky 2. PoisonedSquid 3. MtheJoker 4. MaximusPrime 5. NuclearBurrito 6. Simon 7. CaptainNerbins 8. Whammerist 9. htm 10. firekitten 11. 12. 13. 14. 15. 16.
